docs.lead_paragraph: On the verge of collapsing, the Negro Leagues Baseball Museum brought back a leader to reconnect baseball’s past to the museum’s future success.
docs.abstract: Negro League Baseball Museum is once again thriving five years after bringing back leader Bob Kendrick, increasing its attendance to 60,000 visitors and turning modest profit; Kendrick is widely credited with rescuing organization from verge of financial collapse.

headline.main: A Comeback for Negro Leagues Museum
